original: Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na hetum na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca nanahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na na hetu na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
